mapper.select:
select
from w_user where user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_is_valid = '1'

select ,B.pt_job_id as ptJobId from w_user A left join w_pt_job B on A.user_id = B.pt_user_id where A.user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.user_is_valid = '1' and B.pt_job_type = '1' and B.pt_is_valid = '1'

select ,B.pt_job_id as ptJobId from w_user A left join w_pt_job B on A.user_id = B.pt_user_id where B.pt_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.user_is_valid = '1' and B.pt_job_type = '1' and B.pt_is_valid = '1'
